Producer: Ron Ray, Barry Levine, Mike Bundlie, Brian Baniqued, Jeff Spiegel, Vicky Petela, Alanna Brown
Production Co: RR Film Production, Abstract Entertainment, Trees of Peace, ABrownGirl Films
Synopsis: Four women from different backgrounds forge an unbreakable sisterhood while trapped and in hiding during the genocide in Rwanda. Inspired by true events.
Title: Trees of Peace
